articles.title: Once-in-a-Lifetime Sky Show: A “New Star” Will Soon Light Up the Night - SciTechDaily
articles.description: May skies are brimming with action: shooting stars from Halley’s Comet, brilliant planets at dawn and dusk, and a once-in-a-lifetime nova that could light up the night sky any day now. Eta Aquarids & Waiting for a Nova! The annual Eta Aquarid meteor shower pe…
articles.content:
Catch meteors, planets, and possibly a new star as May serves up dazzling views and a rare nova waiting to burst into sight.
May skies are brimming with action: shooting stars from Halley’s Comet, b… [+7027 chars]
